Title: Once Upon a Time...
Plot: Brother Sam, a minister with a criminal history, is brought in by the homicide department to help solve a macabre murder, but Dexter sees him for what he really is, and it's definitely not a man of God. Elsewhere, Debra's sudden hero status elicits a pair of surprising proposals.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Horror,violence,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Geoff Pierson, Aimee Garcia, Molly Parker, David Monahan, Brea Grant
